dcterms:creator: Brenden M. Lake
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Joshua B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: A dataset used for few-shot learning tasks, consisting of handwritten characters from various alphabets, allowing for the evaluation of learning algorithms in a one-shot setting.
dcterms:title: Omniglot

dcterms:creator: Sachin Ravi
Hugo Larochelle
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for few-shot learning, containing a subset of ImageNet images, structured to facilitate the evaluation of algorithms in a few-shot classification context.
dcterms:title: MiniImagenet
